name: colorlab-js
description: A javascript library which could do many color manipulations

scripts.test:coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.build: npm test & npm link & npm pack & npm version patch

author: Seniru Pasan
